block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Purchased contract of LHP Mike Mohler from Buffalo of International League. Designated RHP Scott Kamieniecki for assignment. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Agreed to terms with 3B Eric Chavez on a four-year contract extension through 2004. SEATTLE MARINERS--Claimed LHP Mark Watson off waivers from the Cleveland Indians. TEXAS RANGERS--Recalled RHP Ryan Glynn from Oklahoma of the Pacific Coast League.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Purchased contract of LHP Mike Mohler from Buffalo of International League. Designated RHP Scott Kamieniecki for assignment. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Agreed to terms with 3B Eric Chavez on a four-year contract extension through 2004. SEATTLE MARINERS--Claimed LHP Mark Watson off waivers from the Cleveland Indians. TEXAS RANGERS--Recalled RHP Ryan Glynn from Oklahoma of the Pacific Coast League.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Activated SS Ricky Gutierrez from the 15-day disabled list. Sent INF Augie Ojeda to Iowa of the Pacific Coast League. HOUSTON ASTROS--Fired Vern Ruhle, pitching coach, and Tom McCraw, hitting coach. Named Burt Hooton pitching coach and Harry Spilman hitting coach. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Placed LHP Jesse Orosco on 15-day disabled list. Called up RHP Gene Stechschulte from Memphis of PCL. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Recalled INF Kevin Nicholson from Las Vegas of PCL. Placed SS Chris Gomez on 15-day D.L., retroactive to June 22.
UTAH JAZZ--Traded a 2000 first-round draft pick to Denver for a 2001 first-round draft pick.
United States Basketball League PENNSYLVANIA VALLEY DOGS--Signed C Darryl Dawkins.

CINCINNATI BENGALS--Signed RB Curtis Keaton to a three-year contract. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed CB Michael Hawthorne to a three-year contract. WASHINGTON REDSKINS--Signed CB Tyronne Drakeford to a one-year contract.

National Hockey League MINNESOTA WILD--Traded G Mike Vernon to Calgary for C Dan Cavanaugh and a 2000 eighth-round draft pick and C Joe Juneau to Phoenix for C Rickard Wallin. DEVILS--Reacquired G Chris Terreri and 2000 ninth-round draft pick from Minnesota for D Brad Bombardir. Acquired F Turner Stevenson from Columbus, completing an earlier trade. Assigned rights to D Deron Quint to Columbus.

MARYLAND--Named Allison Jones women's assistant basketball coach. MCNEESE STATE--Promoted assistant football coach Tommy Tate to football coach. NEW HAVEN--Named Jay Young men's basketball coach. NEW MEXICO STATE--Named Tony Stubblefield men's assistant basketball coach. NORTH CAROLINA-GREENSBORO--Signed Fran McCaffery, men's basketball coach, and Lynne Agee, women's basketball coach, to five-year contracts, effective July 1. OHIO WESLEYAN--Named Sean Ryan men's lacrosse coach. SAN JOSE STATE--Named Bob Connelly and R. Todd Littlejohn asssistant football coaches. SKIDMORE--Named Terry Corcoran women's soccer coach, Paul Dion men's assistant soccer coach and Ron Plourde women's assistant soccer coach. STANFORD--Named Stephanie Erickson women's assistant soccer coach. Announced resignation of Heidi Connor Igoe, women's lacrosse coach. Announced that they would not renew contract of Wieslaw Kujda, men's crew coach. TRINITY, CONN.--Named Jeff Behrman offensive coordinator and Andy McPhee and Greg O'Neal assistant football coaches.
